ManifestTinyMcePlugin.description:
The manifest for a TinyMCE plugin.
The plugin will be loaded into the TinyMCE editor.
A plugin can add things like buttons, menu items, context menu items, etc. through the TinyMCE API.
A plugin can also add custom commands to the editor.
A plugin can also modify the behavior of the editor.

icon.description: An icon to represent the collection view

label.description: The friendly name of the collection view

pathName.description: The URL pathname for this collection view that can be deep linked to by sharing the url

label.description: The displayed name (label) in the navigation.

pathname.description:
This is the URL path part for this view. This is used for navigating or deep linking directly to the dashboard
https://yoursite.com/section/settings/dashboard/my-dashboard-path

label.description: Optional string to display as the label for the dashboard collection

pathname.description: The URL path for the dashboard which is used for navigating or deep linking directly to the dashboard

repositoryAlias.description: The alias of the repository that the dashboard collection is for

entityTypes.description: The entity types that this action can be performed on

icon.description: An icon to represent the action to be performed

label.description: The friendly name of the action to perform

repositoryAlias.description:
The alias for the repository of the entity type this action is for
such as 'Umb.Repository.Documents'

label.description: A friendly label for the action

repositoryAlias.description:
The alias for the repsoitory of the entity type this action is for
such as 'Umb.Repository.Documents'

culture.description:
The culture is a combination of a language and a country. The language is represented by an ISO 639-1 code and the country is represented by an ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code.
The language and country are separated by a dash.
The value is used to describe the language of the translations according to the extension system
and it will be set as the `lang` attribute on the `<html>` element.

direction.description:
The value is used to describe the direction of the translations according to the extension system
and it will be set as the `dir` attribute on the `<html>` element. It defaults to `ltr`.

group.description:
The group that this property editor UI belongs to, which will be used to group the property editor UIs in the property editor picker.
If not specified, the property editor UI will be grouped under "Common".

propertyEditorSchemaAlias.description:
The alias of the property editor schema that this property editor UI is for.
If not specified, the property editor UI can only be used to configure other property editors.

icon.description: The icon displayed for this view in the navigation.

label.description: The displayed name (label) in the navigation.

pathname.description:
This is the URL path part for this view. This is used for navigating or deep linking directly to the view
https://yoursite.com/section/settings/view/my-view-path

toolbar.description:
If the plugin adds toolbar buttons, this property can be used to configure the buttons.
This configuration will be used on the Rich Text Editor configuration page.

alias.description: The alias of the toolbar button that will be configured in the TinyMCE editor.

icon.description: The icon shown on the Rich Text Editor configuration page. The icon has to be a part of TinyMCE's icon set.

label.description: The label of the option shown on the Rich Text Editor configuration page.

entityTypes.description: The entity types that this action can be performed on

icon.description: An icon to represent the action to be performed

label.description: The friendly name of the action to perform

repositoryAlias.description:
The alias for the repository of the entity type this action is for
such as 'Umb.Repository.Documents'

workspaceActions.description: Define which workspace actions this menu item should be shown for.

match.description: Define the section that this extension should be available in

imports.description: This is used to define the module specifiers and their respective paths for the package to be used in the browser.
imports.title: A module specifier with a path for the importmap

scopes.description: This is used to define the scopes for the package to be used in the browser. It has to specify a path and a value that is an object with module specifiers and their respective paths.
scopes.title: The importmap scopes for the package

match.description: Define the workspace that this extension should be available in

oneOf.description: Define one or more workspaces that this extension should be available in

match.description: Define the workspace that this extension should be available in

allowTelemetry.title: Decides if the package sends telemetry data for collection

extensions.title: An array of Umbraco package manifest types that will be installed

id.title: The unique identifier of the Umbraco package

importmap.description: This is used to define the imports and the scopes for the package to be used in the browser. It will be combined with the global importmap.
importmap.title: The importmap for the package

name.title: The name of the Umbraco package

version.title: The version of the Umbraco package in the style of semver
